Class PizzaSalesKB

java.lang.Object
PizzaSalesKB.PizzaSalesKB
public class PizzaSalesKB extends Object
Name: PizzaSalesKB Abstract: This program calculates total pizza sales, highest and lowest sale, average sale, and commission per employee.
Author:
Keith Brock

      dblHighest - The highest sale for the day.
